feedback.message: Your groove is unstable—reduce complexity. Tempo drift detected—re-center your time. You're playing too dense—leave space. Recovery mode: simplify rhythm and reduce tempo slightly. Tempo drift override: re-center time before probing. Density override: leave space to improve control.
hints: Reduce to a simpler rhythm pattern.
Focus on landing strums exactly on the beat.
Tap your foot on every beat and match your strum to it.
Try halving the number of strums per bar.
